creator: Tobias.Marty@gmx.de

comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:61.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/61.0
Build ID: 20180419224145

Steps to reproduce:

Opened a post in the new Reddit design, which opens an in-page pop-up with all the comments. 


Actual results:

The scollbar on the right hand side doesn't display the thumb. It can be used by clicking on it blindly though.

If you take a screenshot with Nightly's built-in screenshot tool the thumb is shown.


Expected results:

The scollbar thumb is shown as expected.
comments.author: Tobias.Marty@gmx.de

comments.text:
Thanks!

(Speculative STR: Repeatedly remove all site cookies and load https://new.reddit.com/r/firefox/ until you see the new theme.)

Regression window from bug 1451168 comment 2:
mozregression --repo autoland --launch 7a6d3d03bb20c881d25ae7e6fdb2fbb981e335b7 --pref gfx.webrender.all:true startup.homepage_welcome_url:"https://new.reddit.com/r/firefox/"
good

mozregression --repo autoland --launch cf1fdb432d46e52f795b3e253e851fbf775b2af1 --pref gfx.webrender.all:true startup.homepage_welcome_url:"https://new.reddit.com/r/firefox/"
bad

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 1451168 ***

summary: Scrollbar thumb not visible in Reddit redesign
